titleStmt.author: Tomkins, John, ca. 1663-1706.

notesStmt.note: "An earnest perswasive, by way of postscript, for all to mind and receive God's Holy Spirit in their hearts, .. By John Feild." has a separate undated title page on p. 95.
Reproduction of the original in the Friends' House Library, London.
